title: 正版启动器怎么设置内存
author: tanfutao

replies.author: Deing
replies.txt_content:
edit profile 最下面有一个jvm arguments，旁边写着
-Xmx1G -XX:+UseConcMarkSweepGC -XX:+CMSIncrementalMode -XX:-UseAdaptiveSizePolicy -Xmn128M
点击它左边的方块后可以编辑这个内容。Xmx1G是说最大1G，Xmn128M是说最小128M，这就是改内存

replies.author: 空影~迷幻
replies.txt_content:
Deing 发表于 2016-3-15 14:28
edit profile 最下面有一个jvm arguments，旁边写着
-Xmx1G -XX:+UseConcMarkSweepGC -XX:+CMSIncrementalM ...
正解[diamond_sword]
